description: This seafood paella packs a bit of heat and is the perfect dish for a sunny evening.
name: Spicy Seafood Paella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lemon, juice and zest of 1, 1 sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a wide pan on medium high heat and cook the onion for 3-4 minutes, add the capsicum and garlic and cook for 2 minutes, stir in the paprika and cayenne pepper and cook for 1 minute.

Mix in the rice, stirring to coat well with the garlic and paprika. Add the saffron, pour over the hot stock and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes uncovered, stirring every couple of minutes.
Place the lid on the pan and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the prawns, seafood mix and peas, cover and cook for 4 minutes or until the seafood is piping hot.
Remove from the heat, add lemon zest and juice and chopped parsley. Leave to stand for 1 minute and serve with cracked black pepper and lemon wedges.
